summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of sports betting guide application. All 8 required features from review request are working perfectly. Major improvements verified: 120 upcoming matches displayed, AI analysis with 86% confidence predictions, parlay builder fully functional with match selection and calculations.
passed_tests: Dashboard shows 120 UPCOMING matches (not past games) - REQUIREMENT VERIFIED
Match cards show Home/Draw/Away odds (360 odds values found) - REQUIREMENT VERIFIED
Match cards show 'Upcoming' status badges (122 badges found) - REQUIREMENT VERIFIED
Click View Analysis opens match detail page successfully - REQUIREMENT VERIFIED
AI Analysis shows prediction (HOME WIN), confidence (86%), best bet (Home Win & Over 2.5 Goals) - REQUIREMENT VERIFIED
Parlay Builder loads and shows 120 matches in dropdown - REQUIREMENT VERIFIED
Add selection to parlay works (Liverpool vs Qarabag added successfully) - REQUIREMENT VERIFIED
Filters work: Sport filter (Football/Basketball/All Sports), League filter (9 options) - REQUIREMENT VERIFIED
Match detail page displays Liverpool FC vs QarabaÄŸ with full AI analysis
AI analysis includes prediction, confidence bar, best bet, reasoning, risk level (MEDIUM)
Parlay Builder shows parlay calculations (Combined Odds, Win Probability, Potential Return)
Professional dark theme UI with proper team logos and responsive design
Navigation between Dashboard, Match Detail, and Parlay Builder works seamlessly
Real upcoming fixtures from Football-Data.org API (Champions League, Premier League, etc.)
Generated odds display correctly in Home/Draw/Away format
